title: The Empty Granary
description: The Northern Granary supplying twelve bakeries shows dramatically lower stock. Grain Inspector Horta suspects organised theft. A midnight wagon and a nervous bin-keeper named Fen point to a Market Ward merchant cornering the flour supply.

turns.narrative: Bin Two's seal was re-applied sloppily — wax drips the wrong way. Horta points this out with grim satisfaction. Either someone panicked or was working quickly in the dark.
turns.choice_a: Question all granary workers about the seal discrepancy
turns.consequence_a: Bin-keeper Fen becomes uncomfortable and admits he saw a wagon arrive at night, not on the schedule.
turns.choice_b: Examine the bin's interior for physical evidence
turns.consequence_b: Wide-axle wagon wheel grooves in the floor don't match standard narrow delivery carts.

turns.narrative: The off-schedule wagon is traced to driver Cott, who has been making paid midnight runs for a merchant consolidating grain to corner the flour market.
turns.choice_a: Follow the grain trail to the merchant immediately
turns.consequence_a: The merchant's warehouse is packed with unsold grain. You have enough evidence to act.
turns.choice_b: Use Cott as an informant under promise of leniency
turns.consequence_b: Cott agrees and identifies three additional warehouse locations.

turns.narrative: With evidence gathered you move to end the smuggling operation.
turns.choice_a: Report the full network to Horta and Ward Authority
turns.consequence_a: All grain is seized and returned. The merchant is arrested.
turns.choice_b: Give Cott time to flee before reporting, honouring your promise
turns.consequence_b: Cott disappears. The merchant is arrested alone. Horta approves.

cott_spared.description: Cott was allowed to flee. Case still resolved.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.
